title: Redgates Secrets
description: A house called Redgates...A place where shadows become monsters and the chilling truth is revealed in secrets better left untold. Some nightmares hide in the shadows of the day. The locals have another name for this house: The House of Blood & Secrets...Alicia and Joseph Jackson are a couple at cracking point. After years of trying and failing to conceive, Alicia has finally fallen pregnant. But worried for her safety, her doctor prescribes a complete change of pace. What better change of pace but to buy a mortgagee sale smallholding in the country-side? The house has a name: REDGATES. Alicia is immediately charmed by this beautiful sprawling mansion. She can see her baby being born and nurtured here. Joseph is taken with the mysterious history of this old homestead.
